FuncDef: The display dns ipv6 dynamic-host command displays dynamic IPv6 DNS entries in the domain name cache.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the VPN to be displayed.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: No   Domain Name           Ipv6Address                              TTL          Alias
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After you configure dynamic DNS, to check dynamic IPv6 DNS entries in the domain name cache, run the display dns ipv6 dynamic-host command.
